mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, b.clientype FROM biz_contract a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1
and (a.`status` is null or a.`status` in(1,2))
and a.`status` in(1,3,61)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(4,51,52,53)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(51,54,55,56)
and a.finance=2 and a.`status` in(3,30)
and a.filecode like concat('%',#{filecode},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.bname like concat('%',#{bname},'%')
and a.identify like concat('%',#{identify},'%')
and b.clientype = #{clientype}
and a.sellid = #{sellid}
and a.shopid = #{shopid}
and a.status=8 and a.status2 in(1,3,4,5)
and a.status=62 and a.status2=1
and a.status in(30,7,8)
and a.status in(3,62) and a.finance=1 and a.status2 is null
order by a.createtime desc limit #{start},#{size}

select count(*) from `biz_contract` a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1
and (a.`status` is null or a.`status` in(1,2))
and a.`status` in(1,3,61)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(4,51,52,53)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(51,54,55,56)
and a.finance=2 and a.`status` in(3,30)
and a.filecode like concat('%',#{filecode},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.bname like concat('%',#{bname},'%')
and a.identify like concat('%',#{identify},'%')
and b.clientype = #{clientype}
and a.sellid = #{sellid}
and a.shopid = #{shopid}
and a.status=8 and a.status2 in(1,3,4,5)
and a.status=62 and a.status2=1
and a.status in(30,7,8)
and a.status in(3,62) and a.finance=1 and a.status2 is null

select
from biz_contract contract where 1=1 and contract.issendstatus=1 and contract.finance = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(contract.materialoutboundtime,'%Y-%m-%d') in
#{item}
mapper.update:
update biz_contract
sendstatus = #{sendstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smsmsgid = #{smsmsgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smsmodifytime = #{smsmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where smsuid = #{smsuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

shopname = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sellername = #{sellername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reportinsurance = #{reportinsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
qualitytotalprice = #{qualitytotalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reportpromise = #{reportpromise,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
reportstatus = #{reportstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reporttime = #{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zeropur = #{zeropur,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkresult = #{checkresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carid = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
changecarid = #{changecarid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
changevin = #{changevin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refundreason = #{refundreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
finalpay = #{finalpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
realfinalpay = #{realfinalpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
financerealdownpay = #{financerealdownpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
handbook = #{handbook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carkey = #{carkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
threecer = #{threecer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
billthree = #{billthree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insurancebill = #{insurancebill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delaybill = #{delaybill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualitybill = #{qualitybill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
productcer = #{productcer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carplate = #{carplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platebill = #{platebill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalreceiveprice = #{totalreceiveprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sellid = #{sellid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shopid = #{shopid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status2 = #{status2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repairmoney = #{repairmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
refundcause = #{refundcause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualitypriceyear = #{qualitypriceyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qualitypricenature = #{qualitypricenature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
materialoutboundtime = #{materialoutboundtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
submitstatus = #{submitstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sendstatus = #{sendstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smssubmittime = #{smssubmittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
smsuid = #{smsuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smsmsgid = #{smsmsgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smsmodifytime = #{smsmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
accidentExcessReduction = #{accidentExcessReduction,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shopnopassreason = null, status = null,
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, b.clientype FROM biz_contract a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1 and a.finance=1 and a.status in(3,6,7,8,51,52,53,54,55,56,61,62,63)
and a.filecode like concat('%',#{filecode},'%')
and a.bphone like concat('%',#{bphone},'%')
and a.bname like concat('%',#{bname},'%')
and a.identify like concat('%',#{identify},'%')
order by a.createtime desc limit #{start},#{size}

select count(*) from `biz_contract` a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1 and a.finance=1 and a.status in(3,6,7,8,51,52,53,54,55,56,61,62,63)
and a.filecode like concat('%',#{filecode},'%')
and a.bphone like concat('%',#{bphone},'%')
and a.bname like concat('%',#{bname},'%')
and a.identify like concat('%',#{identify},'%')

SELECT a.*, b.clientype FROM biz_contract a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1
and (a.`status` is null or a.`status` in(1,2))
and a.`status` in(1,3,61)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(4,51,52,53)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(51,54,55,56)
and a.finance=2 and a.`status` in(3,30)
and a.filecode like concat('%',#{filecode},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.bname like concat('%',#{bname},'%')
and a.identify like concat('%',#{identify},'%')
and b.clientype = #{clientype}
and a.sellid = #{sellid}
and a.status=8 and a.status2 in(1,3,4,5)
and a.status=62 and a.status2=1
and a.status in(30,7,8)
and a.status in(3,62) and a.finance=1 and a.status2 is null
and a.shopid in
#{item}
order by a.createtime desc limit #{start},#{size}

select count(*) from `biz_contract` a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1
and (a.`status` is null or a.`status` in(1,2))
and a.`status` in(1,3,61)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(4,51,52,53)
and a.finance=1 and a.`status` in(51,54,55,56)
and a.finance=2 and a.`status` in(3,30)
and a.filecode like concat('%',#{filecode},'%')
and a.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and a.bname like concat('%',#{bname},'%')
and a.identify like concat('%',#{identify},'%')
and b.clientype = #{clientype}
and a.sellid = #{sellid}
and a.status=8 and a.status2 in(1,3,4,5)
and a.status=8 and a.status2 in(1,3,4,5)
and a.status=8 and a.status2 in(1,3,4)
and a.status=62 and a.status2=1
and a.status in(30,7,8)
and (a.status =7 and a.finance=1)or (a.`status`=30 and a.finance=2)
and a.status in(3,62) and a.finance=1 and a.status2 is null
and a.shopid in
#{item}

select count(*) from `biz_contract` a JOIN biz_clientinfo b ON a.infoid = b.id where 1=1
and a.sellid = #{sellid}
and a.shopid = #{shopid}
AND ( (a.finance = 1 AND a.`status` = 1) OR (a.`status` IN(22, 52, 54, 55)) OR ( a.`status` = 8 AND a.finance = 2 AND a.status2 IS NULL ) OR ( a.`status` = 62 AND a.finance = 1 AND a.status2 IS NULL ) )
AND a.`status` IS NULL
AND ( (a.`status` = 1 AND a.finance = 2) OR a.`status` = 61 )
AND (a.`status` = 4 AND a.finance = 1)
AND (a.`status` = 51 AND a.finance = 1)
AND (a.`status` = 3 AND a.finance = 2)
